name: Friday Night Bumpin'
description:
This my first Friday Night Funkin' mod. Every song is original. All of the sprites are custom. Feel free to make videos of playing this game. If you enjoy it, Subscribe to my YouTube channel and leave like and/or comment. Also, don't forget to tell your friends about this mod!

If you would like to remix the music in this mod, reach out to me in the comments of my YouTube videos to get permission. I will probably say yes, but if I find that explicit content is added to any of my musical works, I will revoke such permissions as I deem appropriate. I only want good things to be associated with my efforts, and I would appreciate it if you could respect me and my hard work in this way. Other than this, you are free to enjoy this mod however you like!
